statuses.x: Package does not function at all or prevents the world loading
statuses.g: Package works without issue or an updated version is available
statuses.a: Archived - To be archived or no longer available
statuses.u: Unknown status - Package may not be in the official listing

mcc.title: Title
mcc.error: Please try again. If this issue persists, please report an issue on GitHub.
mcc.moduleManagementColorsExplanation: The background colors below are used to indicate the status of the module in the latest Core version. Open the Module Compatibility Checker with the button below for more info.
mcc.percentageFilteredTooltip: The percentage ready for current filtered package count
